body:
Sounds good to me.

On 23 June 2015 at 17:38, Brad Fitzpatrick <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> Issue #11320 <https://github.com/golang/go/issues/11320> wants a way to
> know that we're running under a builder, and which.
>
> Perhaps the coordinator and old cmd/builder could set some GO_BUILDER_NAME
> environment variable saying which builder name we're currently running
> under.
>
> /cc @adg <https://github.com/adg>
